name: Lockheed Martin Corporation
summary: Lockheed Martin Corporation is a leading American aerospace, defense, and advanced technologies company, formed in 1995 by the merger of Lockheed Corporation and Martin Marietta. Headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, it is one of the world’s largest defense contractors, specializing in aircraft, space launchers, satellites, and defense systems, with a global workforce of over 120,000 employees.
